role_definition: This service domain handles the operational interface with an external automated clearing house (ACH) service. It handles the sending and receipt of batched transactions, servicing reporting and executes the schedule of service operations
example_of_use: A payment is made between two customers of different banks. The payment is processed via an automated clearing house.
executive_summary: This service domain operates the Automated Clearing House (ACH) access gateway between the bank and the ACH service provider
scenarios: Handle Request for Refund of Incoming Direct Debit at Debtor Bank (views/view_55452.html)
Handle Request for Outgoing Credit Transfer (views/view_55383.html)
Handle Request from Debtor to Debtor Bank for Advance Refusal of Direct Debit Collection (views/view_55681.html)
Process Request from Creditor to Creditor Bank for Reversal of Direct Debit Collection (views/view_55693.html)
Process Incoming Direct Debit Reversal at Debtor Bank (views/view_54796.html)
Process Salary Payments for External Accounts (views/view_54595.html)
